channel.title: dark forest on
channel.description: Recent content in dark forest on

item.title: Altar
item.description: ![[notes/images/altar.png]] The Altar was added with the Dark Forest makeover. It can be natually found within Woodland Mansions or crafted.

item.title: Illunite Shard
item.description: Illunite Shards are obtained from the following sources: Breaking a fully grown Illunite Cluster As a rare drop from Evokers From Witch Quests Illunite Shards are used in:

item.title: üè† Woodland Mansion
item.description: ![[notes/images/mansion.png]] About The Woodland Mansion Rework was added as part of the Dark Forest makeover as a replacement for the vanilla Woodland Mansions.

item.title: üîÆ Curse Enchanting
item.description: About Curse Enchanting is done with an Altar which can either be found in the Woodland Mansion or crafted. Curse Enchanting will take one enchantment on an item, increase its level by 1 and add a random curse.

item.title: ü•î Rootling
item.description: ![[notes/images/rootlings.png]] About Rootlings are added as part of the Dark Forest makeover. Part plant, part animal, the Rootling is a social creature that can either make a good snack or as a source of Petals.

item.title: ü¶â Owl
item.description: ![[notes/images/owls.png]] About The Owl is a mob added as part of the Dark Forest makeover. Owls can be tamed with any raw meat and they will fight along side you.

item.title: ü¶ã Moth
item.description: ![[notes/images/moth.png]] About The Moth is a hostile mob added as part of the Dark Forest makeover. Behavior Moths will attack the player on sight.

item.title: üßô‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Adjudicator
item.description: ![[notes/images/adjudicator.png]] About The Adjudicator was added as part of the Dark Forest makeover. This master of the Woodland Mansion is no easy fight.
